66T.F.summary: Scatec ASA, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a renewable power producer worldwide. The company operates through Power Production; Services; and Development and Construction segments. It develops, builds, owns, and operates solar, wind, and hydro power plants and storage solutions. The company is also involved in engineering, procurement, construction management, operation and maintenance, and asset management of power plants. It has a total of 3.3 GW in operation and under construction. The company was formerly known as Scatec Solar ASA and changed its name to Scatec ASA in November 2020. Scatec ASA was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

82T.F.summary: Aega ASA, a solar utility company, acquires, invests in, and operates solar power plants. The company was formerly known as Nordic Financials ASA and changed its name to Aega ASA in January 2016. Aega ASA was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

89K.MU.summary: Otovo AS develops and supplies solar cells for private and corporate customers in Norway, Sweden, and Italy. It offers Sunstyle solar cell roofs. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

AEGA.OL.summary: Aega ASA, a solar utility company, acquires, invests in, and operates solar power plants. The company was formerly known as Nordic Financials ASA and changed its name to Aega ASA in January 2016. Aega ASA was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

AFK.OL.summary: Arendals Fossekompani ASA, an industrial investment company, engages in the operation of hydro power plants. It also builds and operates cogeneration power plants; designs, builds, installs, and maintains heating systems based on induction technology to the engineering industry; offers satellite communications and IT solutions; develops and delivers business-critical IT solutions and services; and supplies technical infrastructure, as well as instrumentation and control systems. In addition, the company manufactures and sells various metal powders used in 3D printing in the aviation and medical industries; and machines for the production of spherical micro- and nanoparticles of various metals and ceramics based on the use of plasma generated by electrical induction. Further, it offers fundamental data, market analysis, price forecasting, and consulting services to the European power market; and develops various properties. Additionally, the company operates Gullknapp Aerial Center that provides international test and competence services for drones; educational services for pilots; and airport services. It operates in Europe, Asia, North America, and internationally. The company was founded in 1896 and is headquartered in Arendal, Norway.

AKOWF.summary: Aker Offshore Wind AS operates as a deep-water offshore wind developer in Norway and internationally. Its portfolio includes development projects and prospects in South Korea, the United States, Norway, and the United Kingdom with approximately 1.5GW of potential capacity. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Lysaker, Norway. Aker Offshore Wind AS is a subsidiary of Resource Group TRG AS.

AOW.OL.summary: Aker Offshore Wind AS operates as a deep-water offshore wind developer in Norway and internationally. Its portfolio includes development projects and prospects in South Korea, the United States, Norway, and the United Kingdom with approximately 1.5GW of potential capacity. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Lysaker, Norway. Aker Offshore Wind AS is a subsidiary of Resource Group TRG AS.

CLOUD.OL.summary: Cloudberry Clean Energy AS operates as a renewable energy company. The company owns, develops, and operates hydropower plants and wind farms in Norway and Sweden. Cloudberry Clean Energy AS was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

EA2.F.summary: EAM Solar ASA acquires, owns, and operates solar power plants in Europe. The company sells electricity under long-term fixed price sales contracts. It owns and operates four power plants with a combined installed capacity of 4.0 MW in Italy. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

EAM.OL.summary: EAM Solar ASA acquires, owns, and operates solar power plants in Europe. The company sells electricity under long-term fixed price sales contracts. It owns and operates four power plants with a combined installed capacity of 4.0 MW in Italy. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

IWS.OL.summary: Integrated Wind Solutions AS, through its subsidiary, Awind AS provides integrated offshore wind services. It offers a fleet of vessels Walk 2 Work vessels that provide services to the offshore wind industry, from construction, operations, and maintenance to decommissioning. The company is based in Oslo, Norway.

OSUN.OL.summary: Ocean Sun AS develops floating power system with solar panels. Its system consists of one or multiple floaters anchored side-by-side to build larger power plants, as well as takes local water depth, wave, current, and wind conditions into consideration. The company has a strategic partnership with GCL System Integration. Ocean Sun AS was founded in 2016 and is headquartered Fornebu, Norway with locations in Singapore; Shanghai, China.

OTOVO.OL.summary: Otovo AS develops and supplies solar cells for private and corporate customers in Norway, Sweden, and Italy. It offers Sunstyle solar cell roofs. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

OW7.MU.summary: Ocean Sun AS develops floating power system with solar panels. Its system consists of one or multiple floaters anchored side-by-side to build larger power plants, as well as takes local water depth, wave, current, and wind conditions into consideration. The company has a strategic partnership with GCL System Integration. Ocean Sun AS was founded in 2016 and is headquartered Fornebu, Norway with locations in Singapore; Shanghai, China.

SCATC.OL.summary: Scatec ASA, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a renewable power producer worldwide. The company operates through Power Production; Services; and Development and Construction segments. It develops, builds, owns, and operates solar, wind, and hydro power plants and storage solutions. The company is also involved in engineering, procurement, construction management, operation and maintenance, and asset management of power plants. It has a total of 3.3 GW in operation and under construction. The company was formerly known as Scatec Solar ASA and changed its name to Scatec ASA in November 2020. Scatec ASA was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

SKAND.OL.summary: Skandia GreenPower AS engages in the sale of electricity to retail customers in the Norwegian market. The company also offers solar cell solutions, as well as hardware, such as solar cell panels and solar cell roofing tiles. As of December 31, 2020, it served approximately 25,000 customers. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Kristiansand S, Norway.
